f0acfc37-08a9-45b3-8894-76af01643a97.description: The SDLC X-NET is a network of SDLC change agents and influencers within each platform /domain who are SDLC certified. It recognises passionate individuals who are motivated to learn, adopt and advocate SDLC best practices in their respective areas within Technology. The X-NET Members are the SDLC champions who help sustain long term adoption of SDLC through communication, collaboration and building relationships.
f0acfc37-08a9-45b3-8894-76af01643a97.name: SDLC Certified X-NET Member

issuer.summary: issued by Academy for Career Excellence

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of 2 week SDLC X-NET learning sprint
Completion of SDLC Experts Network Foundation Certification test.

90ca98d4-2100-4e4c-8af0-131eec406895.name: Business Analysis Virtual Facilitation

issuer.summary: issued by Academy for Career Excellence

badge_template_activities.title: Earners are required to complete a range of learning activities to support them develop the knowledge to be able to effectively facilitate workshops virtually. This includes demonstrating understanding of the BABOK elicitation and collaboration knowledge area and completing the required learning materials.

Earners are required to have their skills observed by their People Leader, Practice Lead or Chapter Lead to verify they have met the proficiency level. On successful completion of the observation the earner is entitled to claim their digital badge.
